          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_f45fb2f7cba3407aeb167334c6bf99392a92e2d6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Enthalpy cycle for ammonia production</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enthalpieschleife für Ammoniakproduktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cycle d'enthalpie pour la production 
d'ammoniaque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciclo do enthalpy para a produção da amônia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciclo di entalpia per produzione dell'ammoniaca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύκλος ενθαλπίας για την παραγωγή αμμωνίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciclo de la entalpia para la producción del 
amoníaco</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the enthalpy cycle for Haber process in ammonia production. Hess' law states that enthalpy change for the two routes must be equal.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">haber process</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hess's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enthalpy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enthalpy change</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Enthalpieschleife für 
Haber Prozeß in der Ammoniakproduktion. Gesetz Hess' gibt an, 
daß Enthalpieänderung für die zwei Wege gleich sein muß.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le cycle d'enthalpie 
pour le processus de Haber dans la production d'ammoniaque. La 
loi de Hess déclare que le changement d'enthalpie pour les deux 
itinéraires doit être égal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o ciclo do enthalpy para
o processo de Haber na produção da amônia. A lei de Hess' 
indica que a mudança do enthalpy para as duas rotas deve ser igual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il ciclo di entalpia 
per il processo di Haber nella produzione dell'ammoniaca. La 
legge del Hess dichiara che il cambiamento di entalpia per i 
due itinerari deve essere uguale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κύκλο ενθαλπίας για τη 
διαδικασία Haber στην παραγωγή αμμωνίας. Ο νόμος των 
Hess δηλώνει ότι η αλλαγή ενθαλπίας για τις δύο διαδρομές 
πρέπει να είναι ίση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el ciclo de la entalpia
para el proceso de Haber en la producción del amoníaco. La ley
de Hess indica que el cambio de la entalpia para las dos rutas debe 
ser igual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">haber Prozeß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz der hesss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enthalpie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enthalpieänderung</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">ενθαλπία</string>
          </keyword>
